name: Michael Gira
description: '''Michael Rolfe Gira''' ({{IPAc-en|dʒ|ə|ˈ|r|ɑː}}; born February 19, 1954) is an American singer-songwriter, composer, author and artist. Now based in New Mexico, he founded the band [[Swans (band)|Swans]], in which he sings and plays guitar, in New York City in the 1980s at the height of the [[no wave]] movement. He is also the founder of [[Young God Records]] and previously fronted [[Angels of Light]].
